getStartedSub: First, complete your profile so the AI can create a personalized plan for you.
generatingPlanSub: The AI is creating your weekly routine. This may take a few seconds.
congratsSub: You've completed today's routine. How did it feel? Your feedback is key to adjusting future sessions.
feedbackContainerSub: Rate the session so the AI can better personalize your next workout.
nextSessionSub: The AI will use your feedback to adjust this routine. Get ready!
confirmGenerateNewPlan: Are you sure you want to generate a completely new plan? The current plan will be archived.
profileSub: Keep your data updated so the AI can accurately adapt your routines.
bioageDesc: Optional data to increase routine generation accuracy.
healthyStatus: Balanced profile. No structural contraindications detected.
backupSub: Save a backup of your progress or import data from another device.
passwordResetSent: A password reset link has been sent to your email.
signOutGuestMessage: If you sign out as a guest, you will lose all your data. To save your progress, please create an account.
linkAccountMessage: You are using a guest account. To save your data and access it from other devices, create a permanent account.
error.routineGeneration: The AI could not generate your routine. Please try again.
error.profileUpdate: Could not save changes. Check your connection.
error.import: The text is invalid or corrupted. Could not import.
error.auth.invalid-credential: Invalid credentials. Check your email and password.
error.auth.email-already-in-use: This email is already registered. Try signing in.
error.auth.weak-password: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
error.auth.too-many-requests: Too many failed attempts. Try again later.
error.auth.network-request-failed: Network error. Please check your internet connection.
